resources.string: A Kotlin-first todo flow that you can ship to mobile without React Native layers.
Nothing here yet. Start by adding a task above.
Task not found or already removed.
React Native would rely on FlatList + hooks while Compose keeps the tree driven by a single state store.
Safe sealed routes replace imperative stack APIs you would wire in React Native.
No JS bridge layers like React Native; Compose keeps everything in Kotlin for mobile.
